title: Police: Arrest in deadly shooting of 17-year-old near Anacostia High School in Southeast
content:
WASHINGTON (ABC7) — On Monday, School Safety Division officers found and arrested a 15-year-old juvenile male suspect, in connection with a shooting that happened on Thursday in the 1900 block of 16th Street, Southeast.
D.C. police reported Thursday afternoon that two people were shot about three blocks from Anacostia High School in Southeast.
According to police, a juvenile male and a man were shot at 2:17 p.m.
DC Police confirmed the teen, Kevin Anthony Jackson II, of Southeast D.C. died Thursday evening. The adult male is expected to survive.
